about_the_game:
A special set containing all Seaside Resort costumes for all eight characters! Are you ready to hit the beach on a summer vacation that never ends?


After the download, the items purchased will appear on the "DLC" item menu. When you use this item on that menu screen, you will be able to gain its contents.

Note:
-Please consult the manual for detailed information on how to change character costumes.
-Please consult the manual for more details on handling items purchased online.
